main.name: Scott Prins
main.bio: My name is Scott, I'm a Full Stack Developer. Currently I'm working with small business and startups, especially in the E-Commerce sector. If your business is in need of a web presence or an online store, feel free to reach out and we can see what kind of value I can bring your business.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details on how I can help your business reach further.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Studied Modern Web Development under a curriculum curated and taught by industry professionals.

work.title: Web Engineer
work.description: Develop and maintain web pages for small business, composing ad strategies and managing retargetinng ads. Maintain web servers and perform scheduled backups of sites and respective databases. Maintain agency-client relations for the duration of a project.

work.title: Lead Software Engineer
work.description: Taking on the role of sole developer for a lean startup, I have curated a strategy to overhaul and rebrand a B2B startup, with a custom web application to handle all of their business logic for their users. Acted as tech support for customers as well.

projects.title: Pumpt, LLC
projects.category: Job Matching application for a startup, built with MERN (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS)

projects.title: CROWN Streetwear
projects.category: E-Commerce App built with MERN (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS)

projects.title: Ronald McDonald House - West GA Chapter
projects.category: Chapter Website for local nonprofit chapter of Ronald McDonald House

projects.title: InSil3nc3
projects.category: Event Coordinator Site for the Greater Columbus Area

projects.title: Pine Ridge Elementary PTA
projects.category: PTA Announcement site for Pine Ridge Elementary School

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Sonny Sangha must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
